description: Detect failed authentications from countries you do not operate out of.
false_positives: If this was approved by System Administrator.
name: Failed Authentications From Countries You Do Not Operate Out Of
query: ((NOT (winlog.event_data.Status:"Success")) AND (NOT (Location:*<Countries\ you\ DO\ operate\ out\ of\ e,g\ GB,\ use\ OR\ for\ mulitple>*)))
